moves.1... e6: not very common against  1.d4.  I tried to get him into the French defence by doing.....

moves.15. Ng5+:
If   15.Bxg5  16. pxg5   Kg6   17. Qh5   Kf5   18. g4 checkmate   
     If  16. Kh6  17. Nxe6    discovery check by the bishop  17. Kh7  18. Nxf8
